words.clue: Heavy object dropped to hold a boat
Where sea seems to meet sky
Pine that stays green in snow
Hot dog topping at a cookout
Kind of radiation from strong sun
Part that tastes the ice cream
Column style on a beach house
Condition of being, or a nation.
Yell out, or use the phone.
Bit of web data or dessert
Vessel powered by hot, moist air
Symbolic story with a hidden meaning
